title: Ta-Nehisi Coates On Reparations: 'We're Going To Be In For A Fight'
teaser: In his latest think piece, Coates writes that "until the U.S. pays its moral debts to African-Americans, our country will never be whole." He discusses his latest essay for The Atlantic.
